By Da_Mullet on Friday, January 23, 2004 - 08:07 am:

By torey luvullo on Saturday, January 24, 2004 - 07:54 am:

of course you get "paid" in that you can sell the materials at the end of the expedition, including the sheath and the peach. but, to my knowledge, there is no other "payment" possible.

as for the peaches, i have gotten 3 at one trip. i have heard credible reports of 4 being possible. 2 is quite common, actually.

By Da_Mullet on Saturday, January 24, 2004 - 09:57 am:

No, Torey, if youd've read my post, you would know this. If you find the sheath and GP in one trip, Kavaro says,"Wow! quite a haul!" and gives you a sack of cash when tallying your found items.It was a very meager account, but I imagine more than one peach would net you a larger bank. I'm not sure about getting the'Great!' screen without 'maybe' though.

By Da_Mullet on Sunday, January 25, 2004 - 10:16 am:

Yes, I did see it with my own eyes. He entered the adventure with Gonzales, gen 1 Mock/Mock, 200+lif, 300+pow, 300+int., 200+ski, 150+spd, 50+def. C-grade at the time, full of energy. entered the shriney thing, found Sheath almost immediately, entered Tusk Tower to use up leftover energy. Found peach, went through cinima about Kavaro wanting to keep it. At the end of the expo, they counted the items found: Disk chips(Tiger), disk chips(Gali), Half eaten, Old Sheath, Golden Peach, Bag of money. "Great haul. Maybe I'll see you next time." Here's your payment.

Solid truth, on my honor as a MRM member.

By Dark Togetic on Sunday, March 28, 2004 - 12:14 pm:

Maybe. When Kavaro/Talico/Rovest introduce themselves to you, they all promise to pay money if you help them on their expeditions...
I guess the requirement is to get 2 rare items on one trip. I'll try to check into that when I get to that point (need to raise the Lif. of a Suezo).

By Dark Togetic on Tuesday, March 30, 2004 - 12:44 pm:

Now that I remember, I've got that same "Great! Maybe" message when going to Rovest's expedition. I found both the Strong Glue and the Big Footprint that time...
Anyway, I just finished checking this on Pare Pare, yesterday.
Went to the expedition with a 1st gen Suezo (Suezo/Suezo), slated from a... Well, you know from what (n.ñ').

Lif.Pow.Int.Ski.Spd.Def.
335209913703186370
5 yr. 5 mo.100 Fame


Found the following items during that expedition: Pure Silver, Disc Chips (Gaboo), Mint Leaf (x4), Old Sheath, Irritater, Disc Chips (ColorPandora, x2), Gold Peach, Larox. Also, had to discard another Larox because I didn't have enough space in inventory.
After returning to the Base Camp, you get the following speech...

Kavaro: Well, well, MONSTER still did a great job!
Kavaro: The adventure was a great success because of it.
Colt: A great job indeed!
Kavaro: Let me give you a reward for your hard work. It's not very much though.
(500G rewards)
Colt: Heh-heh, lucky!
Kavaro: Well, let's go back to my home, sweet home.
Colt: Now I can go home! After all, this adventure was...
Great! Maybe

And, when you're back on the Ranch, Colt says the following...

Colt: Phew! I'm dead!
Colt: We discovered a rare item.
Colt: ...We did a good job.

I have a save file right on the 4th week of September, in case you want me to take photos or something like that (I don't have a Dex Drive...).
I think the requirement for "Great! Maybe" is to get two rare items (for the first time) on one trip. This means, seeing the animation for them. So it's a one time deal.
I'll try to check for the other two expeditions, but that might take a while, since I don't have a Quack Doll yet, and I got the Fire Feather on the first expedition with Talico...

By Dark Togetic on Friday, April 2, 2004 - 01:51 pm:

Just made another save file, on the 4th week of May, to check if you can get the same message on other expeditions.
Well, guess what? It is possible. With the same Suezo (had a little higher stats, of course... But I don't think that's important now, is it?) I managed to pick up the Mask, Pure Platina, Half-eaten (x2), Pure Gold and Gods' Slate on one trip to Kawrea.
At the end of the expedition, got the exact same dialog as with Kavaro when finding the Gold Peach and the Old Sheath, except Dr. Talico gave me 1500G instead of just 500.
I think the way I said it before was somewhat confusing. The requirement for "Great! Maybe" should be getting 2 different rare items on one try. I need to test now if it has to be the first time you get them too. Also, since Kawrea has more than 2 rare items, I'm sure there's more.
I'm starting another new game to test this. Might take another week until I post the results.

By Dark Togetic on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 10:52 am:

OK... I guess I have to apologize again, due to more problems (and my brother taking away the PS2...) I haven't been able to test this... Until last Sunday. Also, I think I was a little rude on that last post =/.
Made another save file, not getting the Fire Feather on the very first expedition to test getting 3 different rare items on Kawrea. Slated a new Suezo for this purpose, stats as follows before the expedition.

Lif.Pow.Int.Ski.Spd.Int.
313508709549267244


5yr. 2mo.. Tried several times to get Gods' Slate, Mask and Fire Feather on one trip. However, for some odd reason I couldn't do that. Instead, I got some interesting results...
Found a Mask, 3 Gods' Slates and one Irritater during one expedition. At the end of it, the following dialog appeared.

Talico: Well, well. This adventure turned out to be a great success!
Colt: Very good!
Talico: Let me give you a reward for your hard work. It's just a small token of my gratitude.
(3000G rewards)
Colt: Extremely lucky!
Talico: Well, let's go back to my home, sweet home.
Colt: Now I can go home! After all, this adventure was...
Great!

What Colt said when returning to the Ranch changed too...

Colt: Phew! I'm dead!
Colt: Well, the adventure ended in success.
Colt: If this is typical I want to go again.

I'm getting confused about this... People have reported getting 2 Gold Peaches on one trip to Pare Pare, yet they didn't receive any reward. Has anyone tried to get 2 Gold Peaches and the Old Sheath?
From what I've tested, I guess "Great!" is the most you can get. Got the same message when finding the Mask and 2 Gods' Slates, but I didn't write it down that time because I didn't expect that. In fact... I almost had to hit my head against a wall after this =/...
I wonder what the requirement for "Great!" is then...
